text: Volodymyr Smarovoz (; 11 May 1956) is a former professional Soviet football defender and coach. Smarovoz was one of the most played for SKA Odessa with 315 yielding only to Serhiy Marusyn.As there were military engagements... (ВЕДЬ БЫЛИ Ж СХВАТКИ БОЕВЫЕ...). title: Volodymyr Smarovoz
